Footnote to essay "Why They Hate Us": one week after the US presidential election (and three days after Part IV was uploaded to the Bay), Israel initiated "Operation Pillar of Cloud", the successor of Operation Cast Lead / the Gaza Massacre.  Civilian casualties are already mounting, and a second land invasion of the Strip is imminent.
